sectionDescriptions.admin: Complete administrative interface with full system control, user management, advanced settings and real-time monitoring.
sectionDescriptions.dashboard: Main dashboard with real-time metrics, interactive charts, important KPIs and data visualizations for decision making.
sectionDescriptions.create: Creation and development process, showing the tools used, applied methodologies and implemented workflow.
sectionDescriptions.login: Secure authentication system with multiple login methods, password recovery and permission-based access control.
sectionDescriptions.mobile: Optimized mobile version with responsive design, intuitive gestures and experience adapted for mobile devices.
sectionDescriptions.desktop: Desktop interface with advanced features, keyboard shortcuts and layout optimized for productivity on large screens.
sectionDescriptions.web: Responsive web version with cross-browser compatibility, optimized performance and modern web resources.
sectionDescriptions.backend: Robust backend architecture with RESTful APIs, microservices, database and scalable infrastructure.
sectionDescriptions.database: Optimized database structure with relationships, indexes, efficient queries and automatic backup.
sectionDescriptions.others: Additional features, special integrations and complementary resources that enrich the user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn a little more about my journey and passions
about.bio1: I'm becoming a Full-Stack Developer at 22 years old, passionate about creating digital solutions that make a difference. Currently studying the 3rd year of Systems Analysis and Development and always seeking new challenges.
about.bio2: My journey began with curiosity about how the digital world works. Today, I transform ideas into reality using React, TypeScript, Node.js and other modern technologies, always seeking to improve and become a better professional.
about.bio3: When I'm not coding, I like to explore new technologies, contribute to open source projects and share knowledge with the dev community, which I found most connection with Devfellowship.
about.currentFocusDescription: Finishing the ADS course and specializing in scalable architectures and modern full-stack development.

passion.title: Passion for Technology
passion.description: Always seeking to learn new technologies and apply best development practices, passionate about AI and after mastering 100% modern full-stack, I will seek more specialization in AI.

teamwork.description: Experience in collaborative projects using agile methodologies, Git/GitHub for versioning and communication tools like Discord and Slack.

evolution.title: Constant Evolution
evolution.description: Studying ADS and always seeking to specialize in new technologies and frameworks, improving my skills and knowledge.
